attributes.action: Revoke the driving licence of anyone who has signed a petiton calling for an increase in, or abolition of, speed limits until
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: institute a system requiring them to retake their driving list, undergo anger management training and psychological tests to ensure they are fit to be on the road.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
